convert_from_wide_to_nw <- function(rawdata) {
  
  lvl_one_tbl <- rawdata %>%
    select(from = hubo, to = lvl_01) %>%
    distinct(.)
  
  lvl_two_tbl <- rawdata %>%
    select(from = lvl_01, to = lvl_02)
  
  nw_tbl <- bind_rows(lvl_one_tbl, lvl_two_tbl)
  
  nw_tbl
}
